achievements.title: Techgig Location Services Hack
achievements.description: 1st Runners in Techgig Codegladiators Hackathon under Location Services theme sponsored by Here Maps. Our team built a Truck Fleet Management and Optimization system using Here APIs.

achievements.title: K-GIS Hackathon
achievements.description: Awarded for the project "AI for Traffic Signal Control" by Karnataka State Remote Sensing and Application Centre(KSRSAC) at Bengaluru Tech Summit.

achievements.title: Axis AI Challenge
achievements.description: Built a tabular data extraction system for tables in PDFs and images using Deep learning techniques. The product was trained on Axis Bank receipts/challans. Awarded 2nd Runners.

achievements.title: Intel Python Hack Fury
achievements.description: 1st Runners for the project "Warehouse Monitoring Drone" utilizing Intel's code-performance optimization tools.
